UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Author: Brahma B, Patra MC, Karri S, Chopra M, Mishra P, De BC, Kumar S, Mahanty S, Thakur K, Poluri KM, Datta TK, De S

Literature.Title: Investigation of the Role of Aromatic Residues in the Antimicrobial Peptide BuCATHL4B.
Literature.Author: Necelis MR, Santiago-Ortiz LE, Caputo GA

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Buffalo erythrocytes:55% Hemolysis=150 µM,Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=15 µM
